author: Special Correspondent
text:
Oath taking and special address on safety marked the National Safety Day observance at the Mettur Chemplast Sanmar Limited recently.

G. Muralidharan, Joint Director of Industrial Safety and Health, delivered a special address underlining the importance of creating safety culture among the employees, achieving zero accidents, improving process safety and behaviour based safety culture etc.

S. Venkatesan, executive director-operations, presided over the programme. P. Manoharan, corporate head-safety, S. Gajendiren, vice president,- operations, also spoke.

Anitha Rosalind Mary, Deputy Director of Industrial Safety and Health and R. Sakkaravarthi, senior general manager-personnel, were also present.

Safety pledge was administered to all the employees. Banners containing safety slogans were also displayed.
title: National Safety Day observed
